title: Ready, set, play: Earn Party Rewards all week long

replies.body: So are we not getting normal draft on top of missing out on the ip bonus for it? ...nice {{summoner:3}}
is this a scam?
this is 100% a scam and everyone who said it's good is in on it and lying about it. don't listen to anyone and don't do anything with the link.
wtf is that bronze slipkns logic? If someone streamed and showed this in front of an audience it obviously can't be random shit. It is a legit one

slipkns? god the people running this scam can't even afford people who know english. 

How come every single account that's saying that this scam is not a scam are lv. 12 and below? is it maybe because rito will ban them all for being a scam? 
And don't just use "this random guy on twitch said it wasn't a scam" bull because it's a scam and you're just making yourselves look even more like pathetic waste of a human. Find a real job, make your parents not hate their child.

"Even on twitch a guy was showing how and that this works"
Oh yeah, I saw it online, so it must be true... come on people, use common sense. If it seems too good to be true, chances are high that it is.
if the commenter on a scam link isn't even level 30 then the scammer made fake accounts to try and get people to click on the link, what a retarded jerk don't click the link it's not good news.
worked for me fine. I know some people hate it because it gives this advantage and maybe it will not be there forever but I am happy that I can use this. didn't have any downside on that stuff
Join Oceanic LOL chat room so we can all play together and earn rewards!
How?
Click the Tab next to friends list and then click join a chat room and then search Oceanic LOL
Normal doesn't even have a new champ select? wot {{item:3070}}
And NA gets a larger bonus too http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/features/ready-set-play-earn-party-rewards-all-week-long
That's because of Team Fire's all-stars win
How are they making you play ranked, its just less of a bonus for playing normal.
Just imagine the bonus doesn't exist. You haven't lost anything by not going for it, it's just an IP bonus.
I've been playing today and norms give 300% not 100% so idk why it says that but still. U dont have to play ranked
Have no friends {{item:3070}} {{champion:32}} {{item:3070}}
when you realize u can only achieve 0% :(
Wait so NA gets a larger IP boost from this and we're stuck with having to do ranked? WTF riot, can we get a statement on this totally unfair event?
If you bothered to read a comment or even go on league before complaining you would realise that normals are also eligible for the ip boost.
He was saying that NA gets a larger IP boost and they don't even have to play ranked for it, whilst people in Oceania have to play ranked if they want to get their bigger boost.
Because Team Fire won All-Stars {{item:3070}}
Error 404: No friends found. {{item:3070}}

Friends? WHAT ARE THOSE!? Cheers Riot for the awesome IP BONUS!It's a shame that the new champion select isn't available in normal's right now otherwise more ip for everyone, but i guess its alright for people who like playing ranked as a team.
Yeah they gave it to normal queue as well not just ranked but in ranked I believe you get 400% IP for a 5 man
for me it says 300% in normals for 5 people, so maybe they are giving us a little love and bumping the normal normals up as well, just not as much

so anyone who is not level 30 suffers in this region from not being able to join normal draft for extra bonuses. ok for me but not alot of my friends who I am trying to get to play more, not exactly going to encourage them issit.
They don't suffer at all, the still get a bonus reward from playing a normal.
Not quite; there is no normal draft.

apparently they will add it soon maybe like the team draft?
not sure... Rito plis
thanks rito for forcing oce into ranked
The party boost applies to normals as well.
Sooo... we can only get the 400% bonus in ranked? lol
{{champion:86}}

Hey guys, come join the chat channels, "Looking For Group" and "RedditLFG" if you're looking for people to play with!

{{item:1038}}
People are so salty. It's about celebrating a new RANKED Q. Kinda lucky normals are getting a bonus at all.
I think people are salty cause there is no new normal que, not because of the actual celebrations :)
{{champion:136}}
why has the bonus IP stopped? its 40 hours before it's supposed to?
I think there may be a mistake here, I got 922IP from a normal game.

Honestly ive had a good time with it just playing norms with friends getting 900+ip if we have a boost on, legit you hate it but its so more people play norms and so ranked is more brutal (less reward compared to norms) its not a scam just suck it up, it works fine, alot of ip for those who play (i went from  1300ip to 5300 in a day from playing a full party, its great!)
Rank mode is horrible, full of AFKs and trolls...
OH NICe！
"The bonus is even bigger for new champ select-enabled queues like Normal and Ranked draft." And by normal, we mean not normal. Ranked only.
